title: AIMO LLM Service Analysis Output
description: Schema for LLM-generated service classification results (AIMO Standard v0.1.7+ taxonomy)

usage_type.description: Primary usage classification for enterprise monitoring

risk_level.description: Risk level for enterprise data security

category.description: Service category (e.g., Collaboration, Storage, GenAI, DevTools)

rationale_short.description: Brief explanation for the classification decision

fs_code.description: Functional Scope code (exactly 1 required). Format: FS-NNN

im_code.description: Integration Mode code (exactly 1 required). Format: IM-NNN

uc_codes.description: Use Case Class codes (1+ required). Format: UC-NNN

dt_codes.description: Data Type codes (1+ required). Format: DT-NNN

rs_codes.description: Risk Surface codes (1+ required). Format: RS-NNN

ev_codes.description: Evidence Type codes (1+ required). Format: EV-NNN

ob_codes.description: Outcome/Benefit codes (0+ allowed, optional). Format: OB-NNN

aimo_standard_version.description: AIMO Standard version used for classification (e.g., '0.1.7')

suggested_domains.description: Optional: related domains that should share this classification

is_ai_service.description: Whether this service has AI/ML capabilities that process user data
